Summary Note:
The RM met Sanders Raes Vandenberghe at a yacht party in Brussels. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Sanders Raes Vandenberghe is a 50 year old Program Manager from Belgium. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Sanders Raes Vandenberghe is currently widowed. He has 2 kids called Janssens and Raes.
Education Background:
Sanders obtained his secondary school diploma from Lycee Royal Athenee Vauboisy in 1993.
Sanders completed his university education at KU Leuven in 1998.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 26 years, Sanders Raes Vandenberghe has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1999, Sanders Raes Vandenberghe started working as a Aerospace Engineer at Asco Industries NV, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2004, he moved to Sabca SA to work as a Program Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 270000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has flat located in Wavre, worth 769000 EUR.

He purchased villa in Binche, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2560000 EUR.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful villa in Namur, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1581000 EUR.

Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
